mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (name, password, email, post_num, address1, address2, phone, grade, reg_date, upt_date, state) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{post_num}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phone}, #{grade}, now(), now(), ‘Y’)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
